Speak Up London

Oxford Street, London
★ 4.7 (156 reviews)
• British Council• English UK• Trinity Exam Centre

About School

If you want to be in the center of the action, Speak Up is for you. Right on Oxford Street, our school is fast-paced, fun, and extremely social. Perfect for students who want to make friends and enjoy London's nightlife. We offer flexible timetables including evening classes.

14 Classrooms
12 Max Class Size
16+ Min Age
All Year Opening
